price: Kuma ka bai wa ma'abũcin zumunta hakkinsa* da miskĩna da ɗan hanya. Kuma kada ka bazzara dũkiyar ka, bazzarãwa.
arabic: وَءَاتِ ذَا ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ حَقَّهُۥ وَٱلۡمِسۡكِينَ وَٱبۡنَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَلَا تُبَذِّرۡ تَبۡذِيرًا
footnotes: * Hakkin zumunta shi ne alheri da sãdar da zumunta. Hakkin miskini da ɗan hanya zakka da sadakar taɗawwa'i da liyãfar kwana uku ga bãƙo bisa al'ada da alheri, bã bisa ɓarna da kallafãwa ba.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waāti dhā al-qur'bā ḥaqqahu wal-mis'kīna wa-ib'na al-sabīli walā tubadhir tabdhīran
